objective: Perform hourly intelligence-driven mission triage, aligning high-priority missions with latest intelligence signals.
workflow: Use intelligence.lookup to pull grants (fit_score>=4.5, deadline<30d), revenue signals (stage='negotiation'), and operational alerts.
Annotate all active missions with related_intel_ids referencing the intelligence cache.
Summarise intelligence utilisation: used intelligence, unused high-value nodes, mission success rates linked to intelligence quality.
List missions spawned automatically by intelligence_action_generator since the previous triage cycle.
Compile triage report for the Captain including intelligence summary, spawned missions, and utilisation metrics.
